output:
The old woman at her window Watching outside for signs of life and love
Sighs and hope Living lonely since he's gone
She often wishes he were still living there Sighs and hope
She remembers when they married All their lives ahead
After a life of toil and trouble She just sighs and hopes
Remember she once was young Her entire life remains unsung
But it's sighs and hope
The old woman at her window As if she fell into limbo of life
Sighs and hope Sighs and hope
Sighs and hope Sighs and hope
